meanings.sent1: Physiographers enjoy exploring different landforms and climates.
meanings.sent2: The university offers a degree program for aspiring physiographers.
meanings.sent3: The physiographers were so engrossed in their maps that they almost missed the beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent4: In the world of physiographers, every mountain tells a story waiting to be deciphered.
meanings.sent5: The group of physiographers set out to document the changes in the coastline over time.

meanings.sent1: Learning about physiographers helps us understand the Earth's natural features.
meanings.sent2: She decided to pursue a career in physiographers after taking a fascinating class on the subject.
meanings.sent3: During the field trip, the students pretended to be physiographers, analyzing the terrain with curiosity.
meanings.sent4: The book painted a vivid picture of the world through the eyes of physiographers, revealing hidden patterns.
meanings.sent5: The documentary showcased the work of dedicated physiographers studying climate change.
